description: Try this easy vegan ice-cream cake that uses a store-bought chocolate brownie and a refreshing frozen dessert. It's sure to be a hit with everyone.
name: Vegan Choc-Cherry Brownie Ice-Cream Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1L Woolworths Plantitude vanilla bean frozen dessert
500g Woolworths Plantitude vegan Belgian dark chocolate brownie

recipeInstructions.text: Line base and sides of a 12 x 20cm (7.5cm deep) loaf pan with baking paper, extending baking paper 3cm above sides.
Place frozen dessert in a large bowl and stand for 10 minutes or until slightly softened.

Meanwhile, roughly chop two-thirds of the cherries. Add chopped cherries, mixed spice and half of the chocolate to frozen dessert and stir to combine. Spoon frozen dessert mixture into pan. Smooth top.
Top frozen dessert mixture with brownies, trimming to fit and pressing lightly into mixture. Freeze for 2 hours or until firm. Freeze remaining cherries for 30 minutes before serving.
Invert ice-cream cake onto a platter. Serve topped with frozen cherries and remaining chocolate.
